title: In the 1970\'s a plane from seymore johnson clipped a wire on wway tv tower on hwy 87 close to boiling spring lakes.can you verify?
text:
Reporter Cece Nunn is working on a story about similar incidents
involving military aircraft. I'll pass your request along to her.



In the meantime, I did a fairly thorough Google search and found no
records related to such an incident.



I'll send you a link when Cece's story comes out.
